Articles.Content: How do you delete your account from this website? I can't really see any option for that in the user menu.

There is no way to do that. You can request for your account to be banned, if you like. Then no one could access it. Keep in mind, though, that you would not allowed to make a new one, since each person can have only one. You could have the name on this one changed, though.

You could just type in a random line of numbers, like so: 8340555574957297324320429054823825583406820318592 and copy paste them as your password, then remove the numbers from your copy-clipboard-thingy, so that it's impossible to access again

Maybe?

Why exactly do you want to delete it?
I was wondering the same thing myself regarding marking an account for deletion.
It's not that big a deal.  Just let it drop.
Edited May 14, 2018 by Damien212
@Damien212, Imgur album links have never worked well on this forum. Maybe try linking to the individual pics?
